googleanalytics-desc: Inserts Google Analytics script (ga.js) in to MediaWiki pages for tracking
googleanalytics-disabled-for-user: Google Analytics tracking is disabled for this user
googleanalytics-disabled-for-page: Google Analytics tracking is disabled on this page
googleanalytics-error-not-configured: Error: you must set $wgGoogleAnalyticsAccount to your Google Analytics account number (e.g. "UA-12345678-1").
